item.title: There is a line of potholes across the road close to 1 Oak Avenue, 2nd September
item.description:
There is a line of potholes across the road close to 1 Oak Avenue. The photo shows that the road around them is breaking up so they will get worse especially as Oak Avenue is used as a cut through and gets a lot of traffic. The road is dipping slightly at the same point - possibly indicating a problem with an underground pipe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Oak Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on northbound sign at ///quiet.vision.magma, 2nd September
Tree is damaged problem, 2nd September

item.title: Tree overhanging house, touching electrical cables, 2nd September
item.description:
Large tree outside 32 Kings Road. Was trimmed 2 years ago. Branches overhanging house mean pigeons are soiling on property. Cables are being weighed down and branches almost head height on pavement. Concerned by next year the tree may well be touching our roof, causing damage. Our neighbours outside 34 Kings Road also mention similar issue with tree to their left. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Kings Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Residents are now thinking ok to just throw into the street, 2nd September
item.description:
